ISSUE.TITLE: Allow a store owner to specify whether a product is returnable or not
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Suggestion for flag on product to state whether that product is returnable or not. Our products are services and thus not returnable. Eventually we will want to include some products that are returnable, so the ability to return some products and not others would be very helpful. This property should be ticked by default. All sample products should be also be returnable. Enable it during upgrade. Products that are not returnable should be hidden on the "return request" details page. Orders that don't have any returnable products should be hidden on the "return request " list page. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/41237/returnable-products.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1317 Allow a store owner to specify whether a product is returnable or not
